oai_dc:dc.dc:title: “We'll Show You When We Come to Vote, The Great Womans Suffrage.” 04
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sheet music. “We'll Show You When We Come to Vote, The Great Womans Suffrage.” ‘To Mrs. J.M. Ashley.’ Song & Chorus by Frank Howard. Toledo, O, 1869. Published at W.W. Whitney’s “Palace of Music.” Inside: “We'll Vote Against the Terrible Men.” Page 4 of 6.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Women's suffrage; Sheet music covers; Voting;
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Frank Howard
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: C.M. McClung Historical Collection, Knox County Public Library
